title: Multimodal Instruction Strategy for Enhancing Online Lecture Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Practical mathematics application education for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce psychological distance from instructors by over 30% using multimodal (text+audio) lecture materials.
Learners can explain cognitive load minimization strategies with 85% accuracy by comparing lecture materials with varying levels of structuring.
Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies acquired in multimodal learning environments to real-world work cases through project-based assessments.

resources: Multimedia production tools (Canva, Premiere Rush, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
